dmca.title: NOT A CEASE AND DESIST
dmca.body:
***Please remove all email addresses from the notice.  Thanks - Ken***

Mr. Erskin,
       This is to inform you that I recently recieved an email advertising your web site.  I did not request this email, and wish to be removed from your list.  If you continue to send emails to my accounts, bljedi5@aol.com, kennylb@iname.com, or any account at highvoltageline.com, you must pay a $500 download and archival fee for each email.  Email by you or anyone connected to you in some way is acknowledgement of these terms.   I will send bills to the following address:
Jack Erskin
865 Revere Ave
New York, New York 10465
Thank you for your time.
Ken Buckler
Smithsburg, MD 

Forwarded Message:
Subj:   FREE FOR YOU NOW! 
Date:   Wed, 30 Jan 2002 10:05:18 PM Eastern Standard Time 
From:   <viapro160715@msn.com> 
To:   <i3ustenbig@aol.com> 
CC:   <i3usyi3oo@aol.com>, <saruzo@aol.com>, <kenbach@aol.com>, <emetz700@aol.com>, <ozubia@aol.com>, <i3utafly29@aol.com>, <i3utaluv69@aol.com>, <blje@aol.com>, <sarv3@aol.com>, <bljean@aol.com>, <thump86@aol.com>, <sarv68@aol.com>, <kenbackes@aol.com>, <sarvac@aol.com>, <bljeanbaby@aol.com>, <i3uterfly3@aol.com>, <emetzjr@aol.com>, <sarvagna@aol.com>, <kenbacwin@aol.com>, <bljeangirl@aol.com>, <emetzl@aol.com>, <thump89095@aol.com>, <thump8@aol.com>, <thump93284@aol.com>, <kenbad@aol.com>, <i3uterflyy@aol.com>, <kenbadboy@aol.com>, <actionbvl@aol.com>, <daisy27300@aol.com>, <mazi16@aol.com>, <bljedi5@aol.com>, <sarvaji@aol.com>, <mazi1910@aol.com>, <daisy2759@aol.com>, <actionby22@aol.com>, <actionby23@aol.com>, <ozume@aol.com>, <bljeens@aol.com>, <mazi19@aol.com>, <actionbz@aol.com>, <actionc130@aol.com>, <emetzler@aol.com>, <ozumi@aol.com>, <sarvajit@aol.com>, <ozumo@aol.com>, <bljeep10@aol.com>, <i3uterphly@aol.com>
